Padrino::Router
Padrino::Router like Rack::URLMap dispatches in such a way that the longest paths are tried first, since they are most specific.
trans-unit.target: 像Rack::URLMap这样的Padrino::Router派发方式是先尝试最长的路径,因为它们是最特殊的。

trans-unit.source: Page caching is easy to integrate into your application. To turn it on, simply provide the :cache => true option on either a controller or one of its routes. By default, cached content is persisted with a “file store” –that is, in a subdirectory of your application root.
trans-unit.target: 页面缓存易于集成到您的应用程序中。要打开它，只需在控制器或其路由之一上提供 :cache => true 选项。默认情况下，缓存的内容将通过“文件存储”保留-即在应用程序根目录的子目录中。

Register the helper module
Register these helpers:
Register this module as being loaded from a gem. This automatically sets the root and therefore the dependency paths correctly.
trans-unit.target: 将此模块注册为从 gem 中加载。这将自动设置根目录,从而正确设置依赖路径。

trans-unit.source: Registers a gem with padrino. This relieves the caller from setting up loadpaths by itself and enables Padrino to look up apps in gem folder.
trans-unit.target: 向padrino注册一个 gem。这将使调用者免于自行设置加载路径,并使Padrino能够在gem文件夹中查找应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Represents a particular mounted Padrino application. Stores the name of the application (app folder name) and url mount path.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个特定的挂载的Padrino应用程序。存储应用程序的名称(应用程序文件夹名称)和url挂载路径。

trans-unit.source: Require initializers before all other dependencies. Dependencies from 'config' folder are NOT re-required on reload.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他依赖关系之前需要初始化器。来自'config'文件夹的依赖项在重新加载时不需要。

trans-unit.source: Requires each file matched in the glob pattern into the application FileSet.glob_require('padrino-core/application/*.rb', __FILE__)
trans-unit.target: 要求每一个在glob模式中匹配的文件进入应用程序 FileSet.glob_require('padrino-core/application/*.rb',__FILE__)

trans-unit.source: Requires necessary dependencies as well as application files from root lib and models.
trans-unit.target: 需要必要的依赖关系,以及来自根库和模型的应用文件。

trans-unit.source: Resets all routes, current order and preparation.
trans-unit.target: 重置所有路线、当前顺序和准备工作。

trans-unit.source: Resets application routes to only routes not defined by the user.
trans-unit.target: 将申请途径重设为只有用户未定义的途径。

trans-unit.source: Resolves a filename and line-number from caller.
trans-unit.target: 解析来自呼叫者的文件名和行号。

trans-unit.source: Responsible for add components within a Padrino project.
trans-unit.target: 负责在Padrino项目中添加组件。

trans-unit.source: Responsible for applications within a Padrino project. Creates and mounts the application and gives the user related information.
trans-unit.target: 负责Padrino项目中的应用程序。创建和挂载应用程序,并向用户提供相关信息。

trans-unit.source: Responsible for executing plugin and template instructions including common actions for modifying a project or application.
trans-unit.target: 负责执行插件和模板指令,包括修改项目或应用的常用动作。

trans-unit.source: Responsible for executing plugins instructions within a Padrino project.
trans-unit.target: 负责在Padrino项目中执行插件指令。

trans-unit.source: Responsible for generating migration files for the appropriate ORM component.
trans-unit.target: 负责为相应的ORM组件生成迁移文件。

trans-unit.source: Responsible for generating new Padrino projects based on the specified project components.
trans-unit.target: 负责根据指定的项目组件生成新的Padrino项目。

trans-unit.source: Responsible for generating new models for the specified ORM component.
trans-unit.target: 负责为指定的ORM组件生成新的模型。

trans-unit.source: Responsible for generating new task file for Padrino application.
trans-unit.target: 负责为Padrino应用程序生成新的任务文件。

trans-unit.source: Responsible for generating route controllers and associated tests within a Padrino application.
trans-unit.target: 负责在Padrino应用程序中生成路线控制器和相关测试。

trans-unit.target: 负责生成邮件和信息定义。

Returns text transformed into HTML using simple formatting rules. Two or more consecutive newlines(nn) are considered as a paragraph and wrapped in <p> or your own tags. One newline (n) is considered as a linebreak and a <br /> tag is appended. This method does not remove the newlines from the text.
trans-unit.target: 返回使用简单格式设置规则转换为HTML的文本。两个或多个连续换行符（nn）被视为一个段落，并包装在<p>或您自己的标签中。一个换行符（n）被视为换行符，并附加了<br />标记。此方法不会从文本中删除换行符。

Specified constants can be configured to be reloaded on every request. Default included constants are: [none]

trans-unit.source: Specified constants can be excluded from the code unloading process.
trans-unit.target: 指定的常量可以从代码卸载过程中排除。

trans-unit.target: 指定的文件夹可以被排除在代码重载检测过程之外。Padrino.root的默认排除目录有:test、spec、features、tmp、config、db和public。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a new irregular that applies to both pluralization and singularization at the same time. This can only be used for strings, not regular expressions. You simply pass the irregular in singular and plural form.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个新的不规则表达式,它同时适用于复数化和单数化。这只能用于字符串,不能用于正则表达式。你只需传递单数和复数形式的不规则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a new pluralization rule and its replacement. The rule can either be a string or a regular expression. The replacement should always be a string that may include references to the matched data from the rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个新的复数规则及其替换。规则可以是字符串,也可以是正则表达式。替换规则应始终是一个字符串,可以包括规则中匹配数据的引用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a new singularization rule and its replacement. The rule can either be a string or a regular expression. The replacement should always be a string that may include references to the matched data from the rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个新的奇异化规则和替换规则。规则可以是字符串,也可以是正则表达式。替换规则应始终是一个字符串,可以包括规则中匹配数据的引用。

trans-unit.target: 给定的块将被调用来配置每个应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The highlighter can be customized by passing :highlighter as a single-quoted string with 1 where the phrase is to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过以下方式来自定义 highlighter ：将荧光笔作为单引号字符串（带有1）插入到短语中。

trans-unit.source: The individual Padrino sub-gems also contain README's which outlines their functionality.
trans-unit.target: 各个Padrino子程序也包含了README's,概述了它们的功能。

trans-unit.source: The log level from, e.g. :fatal or :info. Defaults to :warn in the production environment and :debug otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 日志级别,例如:fatal或:info。在生产环境中默认为:warn,否则为:debug。

trans-unit.source: The modification times for every file in a project.
trans-unit.target: 项目中每个文件的修改时间。

trans-unit.source: The name given has to be the proper gem name as given in the gemspec.
trans-unit.target: 所给的名字必须是gemspec中给出的正确的宝石名称。

trans-unit.source: The output might be subject to escaping, if it is not marked as safe.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有标记为安全,输出可能会被转义。

trans-unit.source: The resulting rack builder mapping each 'mounted' application.
trans-unit.target: 由此产生的机架构建器映射每个 "安装 "的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The reverse of camelize. Makes an underscored form from the expression in the string. Also changes '::' to '/' to convert namespaces to paths.
trans-unit.target: camelize的反义词。将字符串中的表达式变成下划线形式。同时将'::'改为'/',将命名空间转换为路径。

trans-unit.source: The reverse of pluralize, returns the singular form of a word in a string.
trans-unit.target: 与复数化相反,返回字符串中单词的单数形式。

trans-unit.source: The router will be treated in this class
trans-unit.target: 路由器将在该类中被处理

trans-unit.source: The units available for storage formatting.
trans-unit.target: 可供存储格式化的单位。

trans-unit.source: The version constant for the current version of Padrino.
This adds the ability to instantiate Padrino.load! after Application definition.
trans-unit.target: 这增加了实例化Padrino.load的能力！在应用程序定义之后。

trans-unit.source: This base access control class where roles are defined as are authorizations.
trans-unit.target: 这个基本的访问控制类,在这里角色被定义为授权。

trans-unit.source: This class acts as a Rack middleware to be added to the application stack. This middleware performs a check and reload for source files at the start of each request, but also respects a specified cool down time during which no further action will be taken.
trans-unit.target: 这个类作为一个Rack中间件加入到应用堆栈中。这个中间件在每次请求开始时都会对源文件进行检查和重载,但也会尊重指定的冷却时间,在此期间不会采取进一步的行动。

trans-unit.source: This class bootstrap config/boot and perform Padrino::Generators.load_components! for handle 3rd party generators.
trans-unit.target: 此类引导 config/boot 并执行 Padrino::Generators.load_components! 用于处理第三方发电机。

trans-unit.source: This class inherits a constructor from Padrino::Helpers::FormBuilder::AbstractFormBuilder
trans-unit.target: 此类从Padrino :: Helpers :: FormBuilder :: AbstractFormBuilder继承构造函数

trans-unit.source: This class inherits a constructor from Padrino::Helpers::OutputHelpers::AbstractHandler
trans-unit.target: 此类从Padrino :: Helpers :: OutputHelpers :: AbstractHandler继承构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This class is an extended version of Rack::URLMap.

This component enables caching of an application's response contents on both page- and fragment-levels. Output cached in this manner is persisted, until it expires or is actively expired, in a configurable store of your choosing. Several common caching stores are supported out of the box.
trans-unit.target: 该组件可以在页面和片段级别上缓存应用程序的响应内容。以这种方式缓存的输出会被持久化,直到过期或主动过期,在您选择的可配置存储中。几种常见的缓存存储都是开箱即用的。

trans-unit.source: This component provides a variety of view helpers related to html markup generation. There are helpers for generating tags, forms, links, images, and more. Most of the basic methods should be very familiar to anyone who has used rails view helpers.
trans-unit.target: 该组件提供了各种与生成html标记相关的视图帮助程序。其中有用于生成标签、表单、链接、图片等的帮助程序。对于使用过rails视图助手的人来说,大部分的基本方法都应该是非常熟悉的。

trans-unit.source: This component uses the mail library to create a powerful but simple mailer within Padrino (and Sinatra). There is full support for using plain or html content-types as well as for file attachments.
trans-unit.target: 该组件使用 mail 库在Padrino（和Sinatra）中创建功能强大但简单的邮件程序。完全支持使用普通或html内容类型以及文件附件。

trans-unit.source: This helper is used anywhere in your application you would like to associate a fragment to be cached. It can be used in within a route:
trans-unit.target: 这个辅助工具在你的应用程序中任何地方都可以使用,你可以将一个片段关联到缓存中。它可以在路由中使用。

trans-unit.source: This helper is used within a controller or route to indicate how often content should persist in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 这个帮助程序在控制器或路由中用于指示内容在缓存中的持续时间。

trans-unit.source: This helper is used within a route or route to indicate the name in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 这个助记符在路由或路由中用于指示缓存中的名称。

trans-unit.source: This is a shortcut for:
This is an array of file patterns to ignore. If your editor add a suffix during editing to your files please add it like:
trans-unit.target: 这是一个要忽略的文件模式的数组。如果你的编辑器在编辑文件时添加了一个后缀,请像这样添加。

trans-unit.source: This is mostly just a helper so request.path_info isn't changed when serving files from the public directory.
trans-unit.target: 这主要是一个帮助程序,所以当从公共目录中提供文件时,request.path_info不会被改变。

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract class that other mailers will inherit from in order to send mail.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个抽象的类,其他邮件商将继承这个类来发送邮件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to capture content of a block-loving helpers in templates. Haml has a special method to do this, for Erb and Slim we save original buffer, call the block and then restore the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法被调用来捕捉模板中爱块助手的内容。Haml有一个特殊的方法,对于Erb和Slim,我们保存原始缓冲区,调用块,然后恢复缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when template uses block-aware helpers. For Slim and Haml such helpers just return output to use with `=`. For Erb this method is implemented in ErbHandler by concatenating given text to output buffer.
trans-unit.target: 当模板使用区块感知的助记符时,会调用这个方法。对于Slim和Haml来说,这样的助记符只是返回输出到`=`中使用。对于Erb来说,这个方法在ErbHandler中通过将给定的文本连接到输出缓冲区来实现。

trans-unit.source: This method is used from our Padrino Reloader during development mode in order to reload the source files.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是在开发模式下从我们的Padrino Reloader中使用的,以便重新加载源文件。

trans-unit.source: This method return the correct location of padrino bin or exec it using Kernel#system with the given args.
trans-unit.target: 本方法返回padrino bin的正确位置,或者使用Kernel#system执行给定的args。

trans-unit.source: This method return the correct location of padrino-gen bin or exec it using Kernel#system with the given args.
trans-unit.target: 本方法返回padrino-gen bin的正确位置,或者使用Kernel#system执行给定的args。

trans-unit.source: This module acts as a singleton returned/yielded by Sequel.inflections, which is used to override or specify additional inflection rules for Sequel. Examples:
trans-unit.target: 该模块作为Sequel.inflections返回/产生的单例,用于覆盖或指定Sequel的附加转折规则。例子:

trans-unit.source: This module builds a Padrino server to run the project based on available handlers.
trans-unit.target: 该模块根据可用的处理程序建立一个Padrino服务器来运行项目。

trans-unit.source: This module enables access control functionality within a Padrino application.
trans-unit.target: 该模块可以在Padrino应用程序中实现访问控制功能。

trans-unit.source: This module is based on Sequel 4.27.0 sequel-4.27.0/lib/sequel/model/default_inflections.rb
This module is based on Sequel 5.4.0 sequel-5.4.0/lib/sequel/model/default_inflections.rb
This module it's used for bootstrap with padrino rake third party tasks, in your gem/plugin/extension you need only do this:

trans-unit.source: This will install the necessary padrino gems to get you started. Now you are ready to use this gem to enhance your Sinatra projects or to create new Padrino applications.
trans-unit.target: 这将安装必要的Padrino gem来让你开始使用。现在你已经准备好使用这个宝石来增强你的Sinatra项目或创建新的Padrino应用程序了。

trans-unit.target: 翻译一个给定的词padrino管理。

trans-unit.source: Translates attribute name for the given model.
trans-unit.target: 翻译给定模型的属性名。

TranslationHelpers
TranslationHelpers#localize
TranslationHelpers#translate
Tries to find a declared constant with the name specified in the string. It raises a NameError when the name is not in CamelCase or is not initialized.
trans-unit.target: 试图找到一个在字符串中指定名称的声明常量。当名称不是CamelCase或没有初始化时,它会引发NameError。

trans-unit.source: Truncates a given text after a given :length if text is longer than :length (defaults to 30). The last characters will be replaced with the :omission (defaults to “…”) for a total length not exceeding :length.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本长于：length（默认为30），则在给定的：length之后截断给定的文本。最后的字符将被：omiss替换（默认为“…”），总长度不超过：length。

trans-unit.source: Truncates words of a given text after a given :length if number of words in text is more than :length (defaults to 30). The last words will be replaced with the :omission (defaults to “…”) for a total number of words not exceeding :length.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本中的单词数大于：length（默认为30），则在给定的：length之后截断给定文本的单词。最后的单词将被：omission替换（默认为“…”），以使单词总数不超过：length。

trans-unit.source: Turns a logger with LoggingExtensions into a logger with colorized output.
trans-unit.target: 将具有 LoggingExtensions 的记录仪变成具有彩色输出的记录仪。

Usage
Use hosts instead of server name for mappings (this help us with our vhost and domain aliases)
trans-unit.target: 使用主机代替服务器名称进行映射(这有助于我们使用vhost和域名别名)。

trans-unit.source: Use layout like rails does or if a block given then like sinatra. If used without a block, sets the current layout for the route.
trans-unit.target: 像 rails 一样使用布局,如果给了块,则像 sinatra 一样使用布局。如果没有块,则设置路径的当前布局。

trans-unit.source: We get an error, because we try to require first a.rb that need something of b.rb.

trans-unit.source: We lock dependencies sets to prevent reloading of protected constants
trans-unit.target: 我们锁定依赖集以防止重载受保护的常量。

trans-unit.target: 我们为一个给定的角色或作用绘制项目模块。

trans-unit.source: We need to try to load boot because some of our app dependencies maybe have custom generators, so is necessary know who are.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要尝试加载引导,因为我们的一些应用程序的依赖可能有自定义生成器,所以有必要知道是谁。

trans-unit.source: Whereas page-level caching, described in the first section of this document, works by grabbing the entire output of a route, fragment caching gives the developer fine-grained control of what gets cached. This type of caching occurs at whatever level you choose.
trans-unit.target: 本文档第一部分描述的页面级缓存是通过抓取路由的整个输出来工作的,而片段缓存则让开发人员对被缓存的内容进行细粒度的控制。这种类型的缓存可以在你选择的任何级别上进行。

trans-unit.source: Whether or not to colorize log messages. Defaults to: true
trans-unit.target: 是否对日志信息着色。默认值为:true

trans-unit.source: Whether or not to show log messages for static files. Defaults to: false
trans-unit.target: 是否显示静态文件的日志信息。默认值为:false

trans-unit.source: Whether the log should automatically flush after new messages are added. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 日志是否应该在添加新消息后自动刷新。默认为true。

trans-unit.target: 有了这个方法,我们就没有这个问题了。

trans-unit.source: Wraps the text into lines no longer than line_width width. This method breaks on the first whitespace character that does not exceed line_width (which is 80 by default).
trans-unit.target: 将文本打包成不超过line_width宽度的行。本方法在第一个不超过line_width宽度的空白字符时断开(默认为80)。
